    • Method Detail

      • handlePOST

        public void handlePOST(org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.CoapExchange exchange)
        Handles the POST request in the given CoAPExchange. By default it responds with a 4.05 (Method Not Allowed). Override this method to respond differently to POST requests. Possible response codes for POST requests are Created (2.01), Changed (2.04), and Deleted (2.02). This post wants a string like: coins-id Set the minimum and max
        Overrides:
        handlePOST in class org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Parameters:
        exchange - the CoapExchange for the simple API

      • handleGET

        public void handleGET(org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.CoapExchange exchange)
        Handles the GET request in the given CoAPExchange. By default it responds with a 4.05 (Method Not Allowed). Override this method to respond differently to GET requests. Possible response codes for GET requests are Content (2.05) and Valid (2.03). This GET returns the amount of LOST game, the lowest and the highest coin amount
        Overrides:
        handleGET in class org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Parameters:
        exchange - the CoapExchange for the simple API
